title: Number of pet stores in Canada by region 2018
summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of stores in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of stores is appeared to be the highest at Month Ontario and lowest at Month Yukon.
The highest Month Ontario has 759.0 more Number of stores than the lowest Month Yukon.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of stores in the y axis.
The maximum Number of stores 762.0 is found at Month Ontario and the minimum is found at Yukon where Number of stores is 3.0.

max_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of stores in each Month on the y axis.
Month Ontario has the highest Number of stores and Yukon has the lowest Number of stores.

Month Ontario is higher than any other Months with value 762.0, followed by , and British Columbia. Down to Month Yukon with the lowest value 3.0.
The Number of stores has lowered over the past 12 Months.
